sets.description: Equipping Precious One, **2** or more weapons of different elements, or **2** or more types of weapons increases all elemental damage by **8%/9%/10%/11%**. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

When dealing frost damage, increase all elemental damage by **13%/16%/19%/22%** for **25** seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
